trans-unit.source: Represents the collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref> objects in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table"></xref> control.
A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.RowControlCollection> collection is returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control.
Only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> objects can be added to this <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.RowControlCollection>.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> object to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.RowControlCollection"></xref> collection.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.RowControlCollection.Add%2A> method to add a new control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.RowControlCollection> collection.
The specified control is added at the end of the array.
The control can be only an instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> control.

To add a control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.RowControlCollection> collection at a specific index location, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.RowControlCollection.AddAt%2A> method.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.RowControlCollection"></xref>.
The object specified by child is not a .
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> object to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.RowControlCollection"></xref> collection.
The new control is added to the array at the specified index location.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.RowControlCollection.AddAt%2A> method to add a new control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.RowControlCollection> collection at a specified location.
The control can be only an instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> control.

To add a control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.RowControlCollection> at the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.RowControlCollection>, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.RowControlCollection.Add%2A> method.
The location in the array at which to add the child control.
The `Control` object to add to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.RowControlCollection"></xref>.
The control does not allow child controls.
The child value is `null`.
-or-
The object is not a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref>.
